text: Meghan King Edmonds'family just grew by two. The Real Housewives of Orange County alum officially welcomed her twin boys on June 5, her husband, Jim Edmonds, confirmed in his Instagram Story. They are the second and third kids for Meghan and Jim, joining big sister, Aspen King Edmonds. ( They also have four stepsiblings from Jim's previous relationships. ) Jim shared a photo of his twins'footprints on his arm in his Instagram Story. ` ` 1 little foot each,'' he captioned the photo. ` ` They made it. Everyone is safe and healthy. Pictures will come soon.'' Meghan first announced she was expecting back during the RHOC Season 12 reunion in November 2017 and in December she confirmed she was having twins. She
